head.title: TrueChain | Next generation hybrid consensus public chain
head.keyword: True，TrueChain，Eric zhang，blockchain, hybrid consensus, Xiaoyong Cheng, Larry Lin
head.description: TrueChain is the first public chain in the world which brings about the technology of hybrid consensus combining PBFT and POW. It solves the biggest problem confronting permissionless blockchain: the contradiction between decentralization and efficiency.

home.slogan: Truly Fast, Permissionless, Secure and Scalable
home.slogan1: PBFT-fPoW hybrid consensus permissionless blockchain with global developer community

superiority.title: Tackles the Obstacles of permissionless blockchain
superiority.detail: The conflict between  efficiency and decentralization for permissionless blockchain is solved by TrueChain with its permissionless PBFT-fPoW hybrid consensus with secure sharding.

superiority.title: Ensures  Decentralization and Fairness
superiority.detail: Using Fruitchain as Snailchain to replace Nakamoto PoW with fPoW, TrueChain ensures  decentralization and fairness for the new generation of permissionless blockchain.

superiority.title: The First  Hybrid Consensus Incentive Model
superiority.detail: TrueChain is the first in the world to design an incentive model for the governance of the hybrid consensus which impart economic awareness to blockchain technology

superiority.title: Stable and Low Gas Fee Mechanism
superiority.detail: Zero gas fee is impossible for permissionless blockchain, nonetheless, TrueChain designs a stable and relatively low gas fee mechanism for more DApps to be built on it.

superiority.title: Strong Global Developer Community
superiority.detail: Among the new generation of permissionless blockchain, TrueChain has a developer community that is the largest in China and the fastest growing in the world.

superiority.title: Open Sourced Grid of Products
superiority.detail: TrueChain brings a grid of products that support the hybrid consensus permissionless blockchain platform and makes the chain easy to use, and they are open source!

about.title: ABOUT
about.subhead: TrueChain is a truly fast, permissionless, secure and scalable permissionless blockchain platform which is supported by hybrid consensus technology called Minerva and a global developer community.
contentList: Many public chains based on single consensus mechanism such as PoW or PoS, are having a bottleneck in efficiency. One the other hand, those based on dPoS or dBFT have been improved in efficiency, but are having problems in decentralization. TrueChain uses hybrid consensus called Minerva combining PBFT and fPoW to solve the biggest problem confronting permissionless blockchain: the contradiction between decentralization and efficiency.

It uses PBFT as fast-chain to process transactions, and leave the oversight and election of PBFT to the hands of  PoW nodes. Besides, TrueChain integrates fruitchain technology into the traditional PoW protocol  i.e. fPoW, as the snailchain, to make the chain even more decentralized and fair. TrueChain also added sharding on top of PBFT to lift the limit of scalability.

With solid and leading technology, TrueChain aims to provide a workable and well-governed blockchain platform for decentralized economy. It comes up with the first hybrid consensus incentive model to use economic awareness as a drive to uphold and improve the chain. Meanwhile, it also creates a stable gas fee mechanism to lower the cost for the developers and operators of DApps, and to make the blockchain more public.

As a platform, TrueChain builds an all-inclusive community to attract the worldwide developers and entrepreneurs to be part of it, to join the decentralized economy revolution. Not only TrueChain has a global developer community, it also has a  grid of products that are handy for the developers, and they are open sourced which allows them to be more user oriented.
The team of TrueChain is international with its members from India, the United States, China, etc.

events: Stellar-the platform to deploy and manage the full life cycle of smart contracts released

join.title: JOIN US
join.intro: Welcome the creative, passionate and sincere you to join us, Sail with us!
join.p1: Once you join us, you will get training while working. You will benefit from the accumulated professional experience from us. Join us and you will be added in the TrueChain employee career development training program.
join.p2: Training is not only a requirement for the continuous improvement and development of each employee's quality and potential, but also an important process to achieve the company’s success.

jobs.title: Go development engineer
duty: Use Go language to design and develop the TrueChain product.
Participate in the software architecture design of the blockchain platform, study the key technologies of the blockchain infrastructure.
Responsible for development related to blockchain core layer (transaction, message, virtual machine EVM).
Work closely with product/design/front-end development/test team, deliver blockchain development tasks on time
Other works arranged by senior leadership
require: Have more than 2 years’ experience in project development;
Familiar with golang language programming, master multithreading;
Experienced in high load, high concurrent development design is preferred;
Have solid computer programming capabilities, especially skilled in the data structure, algorithms and code, software design ;
Familiar with the fabric or Ethereum development.

jobs.title: Investor Relations Director
jobs.requireNum: 2 people (one based in the United States, fluent in English speaking and writing)
duty: Responsible for the maintenance of institutional investor relations, directs and organizes meet-up for the mainstream Blockchain Foundation in China and the United States, and negotiate potential cooperation.
require: Familiar with the blockchain investment field, can prepare relevant materials and investment proposals .
Financial related background, FA background or public listed company fundraising and private fund raising background, financial technology industry
Flexibility and integrity, bold in both thinking and action, can quickly learn the basic knowledge and the market structure of the blockchain .
jobs.salary: Basic salary about 30,000 plus commission (linked to the volume of fund-raising, holding time, fund visibility, etc.)

head.title: Announcement| TrueChain priority nodes election releases result
head.text1: TrueChain’s priority nodes election lasted for 3 months since it started in the mid-May, now the election ends. In accordance with the arrangements previously published by TrueChain, the application page of priority node closed on August 16.
head.text2: By the midnight of August 16, nearly one thousand users from TrueChain’s global community participated and reached the qualification of priority nodes election. Among which are 455 priority standard nodes with 439 individual and 2 teams participated; 340 priority master nodes with 43 individual and 17 teams participated.
head.text3: According to the priority nodes election incentive rules,
head.text4: 1.Priority mining begins in mid-september after the Beta version of mainnet launches.
head.text5: 2.The mining will last six months, until March 2019
head.text6: 3.Master nodes and standard nodes will compete for 2 million TRUE respectively, 4 million TRUE in total.
head.text7: 4.All the TRUE will be migrated to the official mainnet and come into effect immediately.
head.keyword: TrueChain,TRUE, nodes election, super nodes, blockchain, digital currency
head.description: TrueChain will select no more than 4000 priority standard nodes (POW) and no more than 100 priority master nodes (PBFT+POW) by votes before the test main network released in September.

bugfinder.pageDescr: TrueChain is a truly fast, permissionless, secure and scalable permissionless blockchain platform which is supported by hybrid consensus technology called Minerva and a global developer community.
bugfinder.seriousBugText1: Bugs that can directly obtain the limit of operation server and significant data, including but not limited to Arbitrary command execution, uploading webshell, Arbitrary code execution, large amounts of data from SQL injection.
bugfinder.seriousBugText2: Logic bugs that seriously affect the security of system operation, including but not limited to arbitrary account password reset, the modification of bugs, a large number of bugs that obtain user identity authentication information, unauthorized access bugs, unauthorized access to the background management system, and so on.
bugfinder.seriousBugText3: The divarication can be caused by certain means;
bugfinder.seriousBugText4: Currently, a large-scale security bugs are breaking out, which need enough attention
bugfinder.highRiskBugText:
Business operation can be seriously affected by certain means, and may bring huge losses to customers, such as key business operation can be Dos, login interface can be attacked and business system can be easily used by bonus hunter.
Bugs of User ID need to obtain by user interaction, including conventional storage/reflection XSS vulnerabilities, CSRF bugs of core business operations, etc.
Random document read / modify / cover / delete / download;
Modifying user profiles, personal information, and forcing users to perform certain operations bypassing the limit.
The leakage of important information that can bring damage to the target system, File backup of sensitive information or leakage of source code, etc. ( such as the leakage of storage keys, the leakage of data access password, the leakage of SVN／Git account and the leakage of VPN account).
Bugs can Led to the ownership lost of token contracts, for example: Key function access control defects, call injection caused the bypass of key function access and so on.
Bugs can damage the normal work of the token contracts, for example: DoS bugs led by sending ETH to a Malicious address, and the DoS bugs led by the exhaustion of gas.
bugfinder.lowRiskBugText:
It is impossible to determine whether the security of the target system can be affected. For example, the target system management port is open to the public network but cannot be directly utilized, the Banner information of the target system can be identified, and other infiltration testers can identify that it is difficult to use but may have potential security threats.
Bugs that are difficult to be triggered, and those with limited harms after being triggered, such as the numerical overflow bugs that needs a large number of ETH or tokens to be triggered, the bugs that the attacker cannot directly profit after they triggered numerical overflow, and the risk of relying on transaction sequence triggered by specifying high gas.
bugfinder.noticeText:
• The client includes all client programs published through official channels
• No rewards for bugs that already submitted on other bug disclosure platforms.
• Third-party application bugs on open platforms are not rewarded.
•The earliest submission of the same bug is rewarded.
